CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 13, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Steeds On Parade - No.1: The Indoor Horse Show for the benefit of Hill City, at Hunt Armory next Thursday, Friday and Saturday, will be one of the greatest and most unique sports events ever staged here...No. 2: B.A. Blumberger, a member of the Ring committee, and James Barr, director of Lands and Buildings, inspect one of the stalls where the horses will be housed at Hunt Armory during the show...-Courier Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: B. A. Blumberger and James Barr, standing in horse stable in Hunt Armory
